top.title: French energy giant Total faces war crimes allegations over Mozambique massacre
top.summary: TotalEnergies denies responsibility for the actions of local security forces involved in dozens of killings.

top.title: Trump's plan for Gaza backed by UN Security Council
top.summary: Included in the 20-point peace plan is the establishment of an International Stabilisation Force (ISF), which would work to demilitarise the territory.

top.title: Ex-Harvard president Larry Summers steps back from public role after Epstein email release
top.summary: The former US treasury secretary says he is "ashamed" of his emails to the late sex offender.

top.title: Cloudflare outage takes down X and ChatGPT
top.summary: The company says it is working to understand the full impact of a problem which potentially "impacts multiple customers."

top.title: Google boss says trillion-dollar AI investment boom has 'elements of irrationality'
top.summary: In an exclusive BBC interview, Sundar Pichai hailed artificial intelligence as an "extraordinary moment" but said no company would be immune if bubble burst.

top.title: Don't blindly trust what AI tells you, says Google's Sundar Pichai
top.summary: Sundar Pichai candidly acknowledged concerns about inaccurate answers generated by Google's models.
